channel.title: Requesting category button/icons for a torrent tracker
channel.description:
K i need buttons similar to this [img]http://usenet.eatddos.info/tracker/images/categories/music.png[/img]
But fresh and new ones please.
Design is up to you, just make sure they have a transparent background so that i may use them under many different templates.
The categories wanted for starter is:
Music, Games, Movies, Windows Applications, Linux Applications, Mac Applications, E-Books and "Other".
Anyone who does this will be rewarded VIP on the tracker 0mg

item.title: Requesting category button/icons for a torrent tracker
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“inertia, post:8, topic:317294”]

want the psds for them or just a template?[/quote]Template would do fine, i’ll pm you the link to tracker, don’t share as it’s normally for community members only. Thanks alot!

Read full topic

item.title: Requesting category button/icons for a torrent tracker
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“inertia, post:4, topic:317294”]something like this?

i can improve on it, it’s just a basic style coz i’m not sure where to go with it.[/quote]Something like that is nice, just make sure all the icons share a similar style, so icons like that you can just change text/logo for new categories. If possible, send me the finished template as a PSD document for future categories etc.

Ps, make button size 64x64 so it fits my templates please.

Read full topic

item.title: Requesting category button/icons for a torrent tracker
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“inertia, post:2, topic:317294”]Do you want them in the same sort of style as the music one? I’m not sure what you mean by fresh and new :mad: :mad: :mad: :([/quote]Just different obviously, more stylish. I’d like them all to have text and icon, where icon is something related to the category, for example using a Nintendo 8-bit controller for games, a note or sumthin for music etc etc. Choose icons urself

Read full topic
